content.html:
Three senior+ software engineers working at Twitter quote tweeted the below, pointing out how it doesn’t make sense. All three fired the same day, one done in public. Criticising your boss in public always has negative consequences, though this response was unusually strong.

content.value:
Three senior+ software engineers working at Twitter quote tweeted the below, pointing out how it doesn’t make sense.

All three fired the same day, one done in public.

Criticising your boss in public always has negative consequences, though this response was unusually strong.
